typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	clientname as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	query: ("select c.id from c where c.ClientName = '{$clientname}'"),
	format: 'documentQuery',
	systemColumns: false) ~> druglevelinfoSource
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	query: ("select c.id from c where c.ClientName = '{$clientname}'"),
	format: 'documentQuery',
	systemColumns: false) ~> ddDruglevelinfoSource
druglevelinfoSource alterRow(deleteIf(true())) ~> druglevelinfoAlterRow
ddDruglevelinfoSource alterRow(deleteIf(true())) ~> ddDruglevelinfoAlterRow
druglevelinfoAlterRow sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:true,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'document',
	batchSize: 10000,
	partitionKey: ['/id'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 256)) ~> druglevelinfoSink
ddDruglevelinfoAlterRow sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:true,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'document',
	partitionKey: ['/id'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ddDruglevelinfoSink
